/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The sky is a clear blue, adorned with wispy white clouds that add a touch of whimsy to the otherwise ordinary day. The street itself is lined with lush green trees and bushes, their leaves rustling gently in the breeze. Power lines crisscross above, forming an intricate web against the sky. In the distance, buildings rise, their facades bathed in the soft light of the day. The image is taken from a low angle, making the viewer feel as if they are standing right there on the street, looking up at the world around them. It's a beautiful blend of nature and architecture, a snapshot of life in a bustling city.
